Posts.EditableText: I'm using the newest version of quest, going through the tutorial, and I can't find the ask/tell tab for Bob. I've looked through all the tabs but it isn't there, not even on the "features" tab as an option. Can somebody please help me?
Posts.HTML: I'm using the newest version of quest, going through the tutorial, and I can't find the ask/tell tab for Bob. I've looked through all the tabs but it isn't there, not even on the "features" tab as an option. Can somebody please help me?

Posts.EditableText: You need to tick that option on the features tab of the game object.
Posts.HTML: You need to tick that option on the features tab of the game object.
